column5: Hello Everyone,  I'm taking the family to Fisherman's Cove in August.  What species of fish are in the lake?  Any general areas I should concentrate on?  Any help/tips are greatly appreciated!

Pike Largemouth perch and sunfish. Huge Pad flats that are great to fish with weedless spoons or Jig and pigs. I like fishing in the nasty slop thats where all the largemouth are. Also it keeps you away from the kids who rent boats and drive in circles. Pike Ive caught by fishing spinnerbaits off the pad fields. The perch and sunfish are everywhere but small but they keep the kids entertained.
